meanings.definition: To walk by dragging one's feet.
meanings.sent1: The tired old man shuffles slowly across the room.
meanings.sent2: She shuffles her feet when she is feeling shy.
meanings.sent3: The penguin shuffles its way to the icy water, looking quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Time shuffles along like a deck of cards, never stopping for anyone.
meanings.sent5: The zombie shuffles aimlessly through the abandoned streets, searching for brains.

meanings.sent1: After the shuffles in the office, everyone had new desks.
meanings.sent2: The magician performed a series of shuffles with the deck of cards.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected shuffles in the seating arrangement caused confusion at the event.
meanings.sent4: The shuffles of the leaves in the wind created a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The shuffles of the puzzle pieces finally revealed the hidden picture.

meanings.sent3: The penguin attempted to mimic the dance shuffles of the humans, causing laughter all around.
